Title: Relates to exempting certain out-of-state businesses and employees providing COVID-19 relief from state taxes and fees
Summary: Relates to exempting certain out-of-state businesses and employees temporarily providing COVID-19 relief during the declared state of emergency from state taxes and fees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to thresholds for establishing presence, residency or doing business in the state for out-of-state companies including affiliates of in-state companies that temporarily provide resources and personnel in the state during the COVID-19 state of emergency
